title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 106.4 - Scheduled session notification requirements for approved classroom ATAP schools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 106.4 - Scheduled session notification requirements for approved classroom ATAP schools

State Regulations

All approved classroom ATAP schools must provide the

Authority with a minimum of 14 days prior notification in advance of all
classroom sessions utilizing a form and containing such information as shall be
designated by the Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
106.4

Adopted

New

York State Register June 15, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 24, eff. 6/15/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
